question: In which nation "Diosso Gorge" is located?
explanation: Diosso Gorge is located in the Republic of Congo. Diossa was the capital of the Loango Kingdom. Continuous erosion in this area has created the "Grand Canyon of Congo" known as Diosso Gorge. This gorge is absolutely stunning with the views of the rainforest, rock ridges, red rock cliffs etc.
